message: All that's left is to turn off the lights and leave the room.
The time is just past 6 PM.
If I leave now, I'll arrive just at the promised time.
As instructed, I'm wearing a white, sleeveless top.
And I properly put on a skirt as well.
I've prepared toiletries, just in case.
Of course, I haven't forgotten my cell phone.
No matter what is being done to me at that time.
It's not really a friend's house.
The destination is the room of the section chief you admire.
To lessen the shadow of my uncle.
To be freed from the trauma that's been ingrained in me.
I hate to do such a thing while he's on a business trip, but...
They said the treatment would take time...
I was really torn about what to do.
I thought about just staying still in the room and doing nothing.
But then I would remain timid forever.
If I go out, I shrink under the gaze of men.
Feeling suffocated by my tight bra.
Just tiptoeing along the edges of the road as usual.
On top of that, all that comes to mind are strange fantasies.
Despite my reluctance, my underwear gets wet for some reason.
I finally understood when the section chief told me.
I've been scornful somewhere in my heart.
But also the body being held.
The guilt of being molested by my uncle.
I've been dragging it along since then.
I want to erase that consciousness.
I want to reclaim my true self and be reborn.
There are as many reasons as there are stars.
But it's not about the petty details anymore.
I just feel like I'm being pushed by something...
Yusaku: "What did you tell your husband?"
Yusaku: "Well, that's a safe enough reason."
Chihiro: "Because I've never gone out while he's on a business trip..."
Yusaku: "Don't leave your clothes as they are after washing them."
Yusaku: "I noticed the note, albeit late. This, your wife wrote it, didn't she?"
Yusaku: "I'm surprised you're giving laundry instructions to a man you should hate."
Chihiro: "I just couldn't help but worry..."
Chihiro: "I... I know I'm being strange."
Your response is different from before.
I figured you would say with a sulky face that...
Chihiro: "If I wasn't, I wouldn't be here."
Yusaku: "You're going to fix something you've been dragging along for more than ten years in just half a day. Are you confident you can follow me without complaining?"
Yusaku: "We're going to take down your uncle together."
Yusaku: "To do that, all you have to do is the opposite of what caused it."
Chihiro: "I... I don't understand what you're saying."
Yusaku: "You'll understand soon. But before that..."
Yusaku: "It's an exercise before the main event."
Chihiro: "Even if you tell me out of the blue..."
Yusaku: "If you can't do even that, you can't expect to get better..."
Chihiro: "I... I'll do it... a relaxed... smile..."
Yusaku: "It only makes sense if you can do it yourself."
Yusaku: "It's a bit forced, but I guess that's how it is."
Yusaku: "Imagine me as your uncle without changing your expression."
Chihiro: "I, I couldn't think of anything else to say."
Yusaku: "I'm your uncle, so you're the same Chihiro from back then. Would a child who hasn't even reached puberty say 'thanks to you'?"
Chihiro: "Well, last time we met was when I was in kindergarten."
Chihiro: "I'm Chihiro, who got sent to the countryside for summer vacation."
Yusaku: "You've been coming to your uncle's house a lot, haven't you?"
Yusaku: "Didn't I say 'with a relaxed smile'?"
Yusaku: "I thought we agreed you wouldn't complain."
Yusaku: "One reason is I wanted to check if you could obey me."
Yusaku: "The other reason is I wanted to see if you could break out of your shell before the real thing."
Yusaku: "To defeat your uncle, you can't remain as you've been. As a passive and obedient Chihiro, you can't win."
Yusaku: "Will you break the shell or stay hidden in it? Which one?"
Chihiro: "I... I said it with a smile."
Chihiro: "Uh... I'm not good at it."
What do you like to eat?
What are you good at in school?
Do you have a boy you like at school?
What do you usually do at home for fun?
Who do you usually take a bath with?
Chihiro's chest has gotten bigger, hasn't it?

Chihiro: "I don't understand what you're asking for."
Yusaku: "It's not a house anymore, it's a barn."
Yusaku: "Are you planning to just wait and let anything happen to you again?"
Yusaku: "Your uncle, who was standing, is slowly getting closer. Muttering whether your underwear is really white..."
Yusaku: "If you don't like it, do something about it."
Yusaku: "You should do the opposite of what has been done to you. Show your panties to your uncle on your own, and mock the perverted old man."
Yusaku: "It seems like you can't break out of your shell."
Chihiro: "If you doubt me that much... I-I'll show you."
Yusaku: "Don't say it while you're scared. Look down on me more."
Yusaku: "You should talk down to me arrogantly."
Yusaku: "Are you still scared of your uncle?"
Yusaku: "If you're scared, you'll lose to your wife."
Chihiro: "If I resist, I'll get scolded... And he'll mess with me again..."
Yusaku: "You came here to get rid of that mindset, didn't you?"
Chihiro: "I... I understand that. But it's not about logic."
Yusaku: "What happened to the determination you had just now?"
Chihiro: "I... I could endure it at first, but it gradually became more and more frightening..."
Yusaku: "That's proof that you were reverting to your old self."
Chihiro: "Why... why would Uncle, do such terrible things to me..."
Yusaku: "There are all kinds of people in the world."
Chihiro: "But he's a relative... he's my uncle... He knows it would hurt me... *sniffle*."
Yusaku: "Crying alone won't remove the ingrained dirt."
Chihiro: "Since that incident, I've felt dirty. No matter how many times I take a bath, or scrub my body with soap, I always feel filthy..."
Yusaku: "...If you've come here to whine, you can leave."
Chihiro: "You... you don't understand how I feel. How much I've suffered... how much I've agonized... but if I talk to someone about it..."
Chihiro: "I'm scared of Uncle... *sobs* I broke my promise... he'll definitely come to see me... this time he'll have sex with me..."
Chihiro: "He... he'll come when Shō isn't around."
Yusaku: "How many years do you think have passed since then?"
Chihiro: "How am I supposed to know that!"
Yusaku: "The guy you're afraid of isn't all that. He's just a piece of shit who deserves nothing but contempt and pity."
Yusaku: "Curse him with more anger. Make sure he never does the same thing again, hurt him thoroughly."
Chihiro: "You... you're the section manager, not Uncle."
Yusaku: "Should I bring the real one then?"
Yusaku: "Then superimpose the image, even if it's hard. I've done terrible things to you too, it should be easier than with some random guy, right?"
Chihiro: "Y... You're different from Uncle. It's true you did many terrible things to me, but I wasn't a little child anymore."

Yusaku: "If you're going to get back at him, now's the only time. Direct all your anger at the idiot who's ruined your life so far."
Chihiro: "Why... why did you do that to me?"
Yusaku: "...Because I thought you would endure it, Chihiro."
Chihiro: "Why did you do weird things with Auntie when I stayed over?"
Yusaku: "...I couldn't help but want to show you, Chihiro."
Yusaku: "You were excited even as a child, weren't you?"
Chihiro: "That's not something adults should do. It's clear that your intention from the start was to play a prank when you locked me in the barn when Auntie wasn't around."
Yusaku: "Your Uncle couldn't help but love you, Chihiro. You were so cute, too cute."
Chihiro: "Not as a niece, but as an object of desire, right?"
Yusaku: "Your Uncle likes hairless smooth private parts and budding breasts..."
Chihiro: "That's why you invited me to the bath."
Yusaku: "Your angry face is cute too, Chihiro..."
Yusaku: "...I wonder what color Chihiro's panties are."

Chihiro: "If you want to know... if you want to know..."
Chihiro: "You... you can look all you want."

Chihiro: "You... you planned to do this from the start."
Yusaku: "Your Uncle likes to make you, who dislikes it, do it."
Chihiro: "Then I definitely won't close my legs."
She lifted it up before I did.

Yusaku: "Please, keep it a secret, Chihiro."
Chihiro: "No, I won't forgive you. It's just words anyway."

Yusaku: "Thanks to you dressing so lewdly, look at me..."
Chihiro: "Self-pleasuring is the worst. You're not regretful at all, Uncle."
Yusaku: "I'm going to commemorate your beautiful appearance. Don't tell anyone about what I did."
Yusaku: "Now it's your turn to disgrace your uncle."
Yusaku: "See, it's not often you see such a disgraceful sight."
Chihiro: "Doing something like that is stupid."
Chihiro: "Aren't you embarrassed, being an adult?"
Chihiro: "You're all alone, making your penis hard, and furiously stroking it all by yourself..."
Chihiro: "What a pitiful and pathetic sight, Uncle."

Yusaku: "So the man you were afraid of is just this level of good-for-nothing."
Yusaku: "He's just a coward who can't handle a grown woman."
Chihiro: "I... I think he is a coward."
Chihiro: "Doing such things to someone who can't fight back, Uncle is a cowardly, low, good-for-nothing..."

Chihiro: "It's too late to say something like that now."
Chihiro: "And using them to threaten me is too cruel."
Chihiro: "Tell me why you targeted me."

Yusaku: "Uncle only knew the old Chihiro."
Chihiro: "Uncle, who is like a demon, raped me in front of my husband."
Chihiro: "I'll post the embarrassing photos on the bulletin board of the apartment building. I'll make a big poster and go to the pool again, and post it in the toilet."
Yusaku: "The reason I targeted you was because you were beautiful."
Yusaku: "Then, it was because your smile was lovely."
Yusaku: "I could say it's because your breasts are large."

Chihiro: "You thought if you bullied me, I'd comply obediently."
Chihiro: "But if you were only after my body, you could have taken it by force."
Chihiro: "Uncle, you deliberately took the long way around."

Yusaku: "I'm just putting on a brave face because I'm timid."
Yusaku: "I've never seen a woman walk such a tightrope as you."

Chihiro: "What I want to know is why."

Chihiro: "It's not off topic because you're my Uncle. If I clearly understand the reason, I'm sure the strange fear will disappear."

I cried a lot, even to the point of surprising myself.
I lost control of my emotions again.
I started sobbing without any care.
My pride was more shattered than when I was violated.
I was unbearably frustrated by his one-sided attitude.
Even so, I didn't let go of his penis.
Before I knew it, I was holding it tightly with both hands.
This act, not by reason but by instinct, was the most repulsive.
To be jerked off and made to ejaculate at his whim.
So I wrapped my hands around his...
I'm desperately holding it still so it wouldn't move.
I don't remember much from there.
Perhaps he provoked me with cruel words.
Or maybe, under the pretext of revenge, I did something myself.
I felt like I was going crazy.
In fact, I was already crazy.
Eventually, I didn't know what had become of what.
